EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name:default=Act Fast}}, Get the Limited Edition Autumn VMT-Shirt
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Introducing the Limited Edition Autumn 2014 VMT-Shirt
I DO NOT FEAR SAN PEOPLE {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, VMTurbo's unified control platform unifies IT teams - server, network, storage, and applications. In celebration of the changing seasons, we invite you to change your ways and embrace the once feared storage group* at {{company.Company Name:default=your company}} by deploying VMTurbo in your environment.
Click here to start, and get your limited edition VMT-Shirt.
*We love every layer of the stack, especially storage. Get the Best Shirt <http://vmturbo.com/request-vmturbo-shirt/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmt-shirt&utm_content=093014> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
